# Run linter

Execute the **lint** workflow as a **TeamSpec**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_BOOTSTRAP.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_BOOTSTRAP.md)

## Workflow

Run TeamSpec Linter:
1. Scan products/ and projects/ folders
2. Check naming conventions
3. Validate required fields
4. Check cross-references
5. Report errors and warnings


## Output

Lint report
